synopsis.text: Following a disastrous first encounter with her middle school senior, Koyuki Ayase, Hina finds herself inexplicably drawn to his warm smile. Determined to pursue her newfound feelings, Hina enrolls in Sakuragaoka High School, the same school attended by her crush and her brother, Yuu. As Hina navigates the complexities of first love, she discovers that the threads of love are far-reaching and intertwined with her friends and family. Meanwhile, Hina's younger brother, Kotarou, remains oblivious to his own feelings for her and is determined to always keep her smiling. Suki ni Naru Sono Shunkan wo.: Kokuhaku Jikkou linkai follows Hina, Kotarou, and Koyuki as they navigate the ups and downs of high school and the thrill of first love. With each new relationship forged, the risk of heartbreak looms, but the boisterous and sensitive Hina remains hopeful that she can confess her feelings to the tender-hearted Koyuki. Will Hina be able to find the courage to confess her love, or will the tangled web of love prove too much to handle?
